text: The Investigations Police of Chile (, or PDI) is the civil police of Chile. It was founded on 1933. The PDI is one of two Chilean police bodies along with Carabiniers de Chile.Chilean Constitution - Retrieved April 8, 2012 In their functions, this institution is the first collaborator of the Public Ministry of Chile in terms of criminalistic Investigations. == Notes == == Other websites == * Official Website of the institution Category:1933 establishments in South America Category:Law enforcement agencies of Chile Category:Organisations based in Santiago, Chile Category:1930s establishments in Chile
